short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accurately calculates and displays the overall course grade for a course on Gradescope

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
High-Vis Grades is NOT produced by or officially affiliated with Gradescope or Turnitin in any way.

High-Vis Grades is a browser extension that accurately calculates and displays the overall course grade for a course on Gradescope. It allows users to make and select assignment categories for each assignment, edit weights for different categories of assignments, and calculate the current grade using the specified weights.
